means.word_mean: 陈述;通告;宣言
其他释义

lj.lj_ly: Glass, exposed beams, and antiques all combine to make a strong decorative statement.
lj.lj_ls: 将玻璃、裸露的柱子和古董结合在一起制造出强烈的装饰效果

entry.def: A statement is something that you say or write which gives information in a formal or definite way.
entry.tran: (正式或明确的口头或书面)陈述，声明

example.ex: Andrew now disowns that statement, saying he was depressed when he made it...
example.tran: 安德鲁现在推翻了那个说法，说那是自己在情绪低落时说的话。

example.ex: 'Things are moving ahead.'— I found that statement vague and unclear.
example.tran: “事情正在取得进展。”——我认为这个说法含糊不清。

entry.def: A statement is an official or formal announcement that is issued on a particular occasion.
entry.tran: (为某一场合特别发表的)官方声明，正式声明

example.ex: The statement by the military denied any involvement in last night's attack.
example.tran: 军方发表声明称其和昨晚的袭击无任何关系。

entry.def: You can refer to the official account of events which a suspect or a witness gives to the police as a statement .
entry.tran: (嫌疑人或证人向警方提供的)陈述，证词

example.ex: The 350-page report was based on statements from witnesses to the events.
example.tran: 这份 350 页的报告是根据各位证人对这些事件的证词写成的。

entry.def: If you describe an action or thing as a statement, you mean that it clearly expresses a particular opinion or idea that you have.

example.ex: The following recipe is a statement of another kind—food is fun!
example.tran: 下面的食谱是另一种观点的表现——食物可以带来乐趣！

entry.def: A printed document showing how much money has been paid into and taken out of a bank or building society account is called a statement .

If a child is statemented, social services staff write a document stating that the child has special educational needs, and the local education authority has to make sure that everything that is necessary is provided for that child.
entry.tran: 证明(儿童)有特殊教育需求

example.ex: Nearly a year later, it was agreed that Tom would be statemented...
example.tran: 近一年后，汤姆被批准将获得特殊教育。

example.ex: I had eight statemented children in my  class.
example.tran: 我的班里有 8 名需要接受特殊教育的孩子。

means.word_mean: 1. a message that is stated or declared; a communication (oral or written) setting forth particulars or facts etc;

sentences.sentence: "according to his statement he was in London on that day"

means.word_mean: 2. a fact or assertion offered as evidence that something is true;

sentences.sentence: "it was a strong argument that his hypothesis was true"

means.word_mean: 3. (music) the presentation of a musical theme;
4. a nonverbal message;

sentences.sentence: "a Cadillac makes a statement about who you are"
"his tantrums are a statement of his need for attention"

means.word_mean: 5. the act of affirming or asserting or stating something
6. (computer science) a line of code written as part of a computer program
7. a document showing credits and debits

sentences.en: He adds a tag question to his statement to make the listener talk.

sentences.cn: 澄清调整不是真实地不正确的,但是可能不清楚或似是而非的陈述.
sentences.en: A clarification adjusts statements that were not factually incorrect but may have been unclear or misleading.

sentences.cn: 今天的审判在原告的开场陈述中继续下去.
sentences.en: The trial continues today with the opening statement from the prosecution.

sentences.cn: 她否认他的陈述真实.
sentences.en: She denied his statement to be true.

sentences.cn: 此案件一拖再拖, 终于在今天, 阿尔斯通本人在法庭进行了陈述.
sentences.en: This case repeatedly delays, in today, Alston has carried on the statement finally in the court.

sentences.cn: 那个小偷的陈述无从证明.
sentences.en: The statement of the thief is not susceptible of proof.

sentences.cn: 前言主要陈述研究缘起和对各方的致谢.
sentences.en: Introduction Origin and the main statement of research thanks to the parties.

sentences.cn: 我在撰写个人陈述方面确实需要些帮助.
sentences.en: I really need some help in writing my personal statement.

sentences.cn: 你的名字, 帐号和街道地址应该清楚在陈述可见.
sentences.en: Your name, account number, and the street address should be clearly visible the statement.

sentences.cn: 因此,我们截取批判理论价值陈述的任何一个层面都必须小心.
sentences.en: We should therefore be very careful in taking any level of value statement from critical theory.

sentences.cn: 该品牌团队设计了20多种备选的定位陈述.
sentences.en: The brand team developed more than 20 potential positioning statements.

sentences.cn: 他的陈述可以有另一种解释.
sentences.en: His statement is susceptible of another interpretation.

sentences.cn: 他的陈述纯粹是种族歧视.
sentences.en: His statement was simple racism.

sentences.cn: 这里有一些英语陈述句. 每个陈述句的下一行就是它对应的代数式.
sentences.en: Here are some statements in English. Just below each statement is its translation in algebra.

sentences.cn: 在陈述句后面加一个简短问句可将陈述句变成反意疑问句.
sentences.en: You add a question tag to a statement to turn it into a question.

sentences.cn: 这一陈述从未得到证实.
sentences.en: The statement has never been substantiated.

sentences.cn: 他的陈述得到了证人的证实.
sentences.en: His statements have been affirmed by the witness.

sentences.cn: 银行按月给我寄来结算单。
sentences.en: My bank sends me monthly statements.

sentences.cn: 不管是任何一位疲于应付不同保险公司五花八门保险表单的医生，还是那些绞尽脑汁想弄清一长串保险费用结算单含义的患者们，都会明白化繁为简可以节省费用的道理。
sentences.en: Any doctor who has wrestled with multiple forms from different insurers, or patients who have tried to understand their own parade of statements, know that simplification ought to save money.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 开始, 我们发出一份结算单,注明过期的金额.
sentences.en: First, we send a statement showing the amount which is overdue.
sentences.from: 企业管理英语口语（第二版）(2)

sentences.cn: 你寄来2009年三月份的结算单, 我的户头显然有错.
sentences.en: Your March statement , 2009, on my account appears to be incorrect.

sentences.cn: 我每月收到一份银行的结算单.
sentences.en: I get a bank statement every month.

sentences.cn: 信用卡用户每月都会收到银行的结算单.
sentences.en: Credit card users will receive a monthly statement from the bank.

sentences.cn: 我们每个月都会寄给你银行结算单, 你自己就可以查对存款的结余.
sentences.en: We'll send you the bank statement monthly, and you can check the balance yourself.

sentences.cn: 银行按月把结算单寄给我.
sentences.en: My bank sends me monthly statements.

sentences.cn: 当我查看我的结算单时, 发现她们居然鬼鬼祟祟地给我开了每月30美圆 ( 18英镑 ) 的账单.
sentences.en: When I checked my statement, they surreptitiously billing me $ 30 [ 18 ] per month.

sentences.cn: 将这些记录与收到的银行结算单进行对照.
sentences.en: Check your records against each bank statement you receive.

sentences.cn: 银行结算单显示,我账户里还有五十美金.
sentences.en: The bank statement says that I have fifty dollars in my account.

sentences.cn: 存在错误的结算单仍有可能发送出去，但告知我们的客户将不会遭受损失。
sentences.en: Statements with errors could still be going out, but customers who notify us will not be left out of pocket.

sentences.cn: 可以在网上支付账单。此外，还能查对余额或订货结算单。
sentences.en: You can pay bills over the Internet. Additionally, you can check your balance or order statements.

sentences.cn: 这个时候，会计溜了——带走了我所有的银行结算单、资金和收据。
sentences.en: At this point, the accountant did a runner — with all my bank statements, expenses and receipts.

Sentence.sentence: Alaska State Troopers released a statement saying they’ve arrested Arnold Demoski, 26.

At the beginning of seventh grade, we assessed the students' mind-sets by asking them to agree or disagree with statements such as Your intelligence is something very basic about you that you can't really change.
Admissions officers read every personal statement that arrives.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Alaska State Troopers released a statement saying they've arrested Arnold Demoski, 26.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: In a statement, Google said: "We clearly bear some responsibility, because if our car hadn't moved, there wouldn't have been a crash."
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: The most important part of the application is the much feared personal statement.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
